Package sheep.collision

Contains classes for collision detection, spatial partitioning and interfaces for collision events.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CollisionListener Classes that want to be able to listen for collision events on a certain sprite must implement this interface.
Spatial Interface for all spatial partitioning structures.
SpatialVisitor In order to create objects which can visit sprites contained in spatial partitioners, their corresponding classes much implement this interface.
 

Class Summary
CollisionLayer A layer which contains Sprites and generates collisions between them, but without the overhead a spatial partitioning.
Flat Implements a "flat" partitioning as a reference.
Interval Contains an interval used in the collision detection algortihm.
Polygon An implementation of the Shape class for general convex polygons.
Quad The node in the QuadTree.
QuadTree A QuadTree is a way of dividing the game scene into quadrants recursively.
Rectangle A convenience class for creating rectangular Polygons.
Shape An abstraction over all shapes in the collision detection system.
SpatialLayer A layer which can partition sprites according to a Spatial implementor.
 

Package sheep.collision Description

Contains classes for collision detection, spatial partitioning and interfaces for collision events.
